articles.description: The 22-year-old Grammy winner - who came out as gay in 2019 - later defended his flamboyant concert: 'Y'all really like to pretend homosexuality didn't exist in African culture'
articles.content:
Lil Nas X went viral when he kissed one of his dancers after performing his hit song Montero (Call Me by Your Name) at the 21st BET Awards on Sunday.
The rapper-singer, 22, who came out as gay in 20… [+10513 chars]
